name: Bobby Carrot
overview: In this ZX Spectrum demake of the popular mobile game, you have to collect all the carrots while avoiding the spike traps, once you have completed this, head for the exit. Each level is on a timer, try to beat your highest score! Levels get harder the further you progress. Graphics are colourful and the ay music is catchy. Bobby Carrot is available in two versions, 48K and 128K, both versions have music.
